benchmark_details.name: COLOR BENCH
benchmark_details.overview: COLOR BENCH is a comprehensive benchmark designed to evaluate color perception, reasoning, and robustness capabilities of vision-language models (VLMs) through a suite of diverse test scenarios.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To comprehensively evaluate the color understanding capabilities of VLMs, including Color Perception, Color Reasoning, and Color Robustness.

data.source: Curated images from multiple online benchmarks, websites, and generated images.
data.annotation: Data was manually collected and filtered using human evaluation and automated predictions.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is computed per task and per category, representing the proportion of correctly answered questions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance on color-related tasks.
methodology.validation: Validation through extensive evaluation of 32 VLMs.
